name: djs-typescript-template
description: Opinionated Typescript template for building Discord.js applications

scripts.config:init: yarn config:file && yarn config:bot && yarn config:env && yarn config:notification && yarn config:database && yarn config:product && yarn config:topgg
scripts.update:version: node -p "'export const BOT_VERSION = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + ';' + 'export const BOT_UPDATED_AT = ' + JSON.stringify('$(date +'%d-%b-%Y')')" > src/version.ts
scripts.release: git fetch --tags --force && git checkout -b release/$(date +'%Y-%m-%d') && yarn auto:release && yarn update:version && git add . && git commit -m 'Update version' && git push -u origin head
